description: The Washington Wizards couldn't beat the Boston Celtics in Game 7. So what's next for John Wall & Co.?
title: How to fix the Washington Wizards in 3 easy steps | FOX Sports

description: Get a summary of the Washington Wizards vs. Boston Celtics basketball game
title: Wizards vs. Celtics - Game Summary - May 15, 2017 - ESPN

author: Dan Hanzus
description: Washington Redskins quarterback Kirk Cousins is deciding to get a little wild on a Monday night. The Pro Bowl QB tweeted he's staying up past his bedtime to watch the Wizards at 8 p.m. ET.
title: Kirk Cousins staying up past bedtime to watch Wizards

description: Die Basketballer der Boston Celtics haben das Playoff-Halbfinale in der nordamerikanischen Profiliga NBA erreicht. Der Rekordmeister bezwang die Washington Wizards im entscheidenden siebten Match mit 115:105 (53:55) und entschied die Serie „Best-of-Seven” mit 4:3 für sich.
title: Basketball: NBA-Playoffs: Boston Celtics erreichen Halbfinale
